1.title: Start
1.text: Create an account or install the app via Shopify and setup your store in minutes

2.title: Integrate Shopify or SDK
2.text: Plug and play. Requires no technical knowledge to install and use

3.title: Select content
3.text: Easy one-click setup to add product information to your store

4.title: Boost sales
4.text: Increase engagement and conversion by providing high-quality product content
